investors.name: Smilegate Investment
investors.description: Smilegate Investments is one of Korea's leading venture capital funds that focuses on investing in promising media, gaming and entertainment related projects. They are behind CROSSFIRE, the most played FPS with over 650m users.

investors.name: Industrial Bank of Korea
investors.description: Industrial Bank of Korea is owned by the Korean government with over 200 billion USD assets under management.

investors.name: KTB Networks
investors.description: KTB network is one of Korea's oldest venture capital funds.

investors.name: IMM Investment
investors.description: IMM is one of Korea's leading venture capital fund that has a total asset under management of 2 billion USD.

investors.name: Union Investment

investors.name: Angang Venture Investment
investors.description: Angang investment is a venture capital fund that  specializes in investing in software, medical equipment, media broadcasting and entertainment related projects.
